speaker: First Senator
text_entry: SCENE II. Before the walls of Athens.

speaker: First Senator
text_entry: Enter two Senators and a Messenger

speaker: First Senator
text_entry: Thou hast painfully discover'd: are his files

speaker: First Senator
text_entry: As full as thy report?

speaker: Messenger
text_entry: have spoke the least:

speaker: Messenger
text_entry: Besides, his expedition promises

speaker: Messenger
text_entry: Present approach.

speaker: Second Senator
text_entry: We stand much hazard, if they bring not Timon.

speaker: Messenger
text_entry: I met a courier, one mine ancient friend;

speaker: Messenger
text_entry: Whom, though in general part we were opposed,

speaker: Messenger
text_entry: Yet our old love made a particular force,

speaker: Messenger
text_entry: And made us speak like friends: this man was riding

speaker: Messenger
text_entry: From Alcibiades to Timon's cave,

speaker: Messenger
text_entry: With letters of entreaty, which imported

speaker: Messenger
text_entry: His fellowship i' the cause against your city,

speaker: Messenger
text_entry: In part for his sake moved.

speaker: First Senator
text_entry: Here come our brothers.

speaker: First Senator
text_entry: Enter the Senators from TIMON

speaker: Third Senator
text_entry: No talk of Timon, nothing of him expect.

speaker: Third Senator
text_entry: The enemies' drum is heard, and fearful scouring

speaker: Third Senator
text_entry: Doth choke the air with dust: in, and prepare:

speaker: Third Senator
text_entry: Ours is the fall, I fear; our foes the snare.

speaker: Third Senator
text_entry: Exeunt
